text: Life is a journey, and if you fall in love with the journey, you will be in love forever.
author: Peter Hagerty

text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Life is a game, play it; Life is a challenge, Meet it; Life is an opportunity, Capture it.
author: Unknown

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
author: SÃ¸ren Kierkegaard

text: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
author: Ernest Holmes

text: Life is like a camera, focus on the good times, develop from the negatives, and if things don't work out, take another shot.
author: Unknown

text: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're going to get.
author: Forrest Gump

text: Life is a journey to be experienced, not a problem to be solved.
author: Winnie the Pooh

text: Life is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
author: Saint Augustine

text: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don't respect, appreciate, and value you.
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: Life is a balance between what we can control and what we cannot.
author: James A. Baldwin

text: Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
author: Jack London

text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

text: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

author: Peter Hagerty

text: The biggest communication problem is we do not listen to understand. We listen to reply.
author: null

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

text: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
author: Henry Ford

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: Mark Twain

text: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke

text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

text: If you don't stand for something, you will fall for anything.
author: Malcolm X

text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston S. Churchill

text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

text: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

text: If you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up.
author: J.M. Power
